com.gratex.perconik.activity.ide.listeners

Class IdeDocumentListener

  • java.lang.Object
    • sk.stuba.fiit.perconik.core.AbstractRegistrable
      • sk.stuba.fiit.perconik.core.Adapter
        • com.gratex.perconik.activity.ide.listeners.IdeListener
          • com.gratex.perconik.activity.ide.listeners.IdeDocumentListener
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.util.EventListener, org.eclipse.core.filebuffers.IFileBufferListener, org.eclipse.core.resources.IResourceChangeListener, org.eclipse.ui.ISelectionListener, FilteringListener<ResourceEventType>, Listener, EditorListener, FileBufferListener, ResourceListener, SelectionListener, Registrable

    public final class IdeDocumentListener
extends IdeListener
implements EditorListener, FileBufferListener, ResourceListener, SelectionListener
    A listener of IDE document events. This listener handles desired events and eventually builds corresponding data transfer objects of type IdeDocumentEventRequest and passes them to the IdeUacaProxy to be transferred into the User Activity Central Application for further processing.

    Document operation types that this listener is interested in are determined by the IdeDocumentEventType enumeration:

    • Add - a document is added into the project.
    • Close - an opened document is closed.
    • Open - a closed document is opened.
    • Remove - a document is removed from the project.
    • Rename - currently not supported.
    • Save - a document is saved.
    • Switch to - focus is changed from one document to another and editor selections (tabs and text). Note that structured selections in package explorer are supported.

    Data available in an IdeDocumentEventRequest:

    • document - see IdeDocumentDto below.
    • See IdeListener for documentation of inherited data.

    Data available in an IdeDocumentDto:

    • branch - current Git branch name for the document.
    • changesetIdInRcs - most recent Git commit identifier for the document (40 hexadecimal characters), for example "984dd5f359532d7d806a92b47ef5bfc39d772d64".
    • localPath - path to the document relative to the workspace root, for example "com.gratex.perconik.activity/src/com/gratex/perconik/activity/ide/listeners/IdeCommitListener.java".
    • rcsServer - see documentation of RcsServerDto in IdeCommitListener for more details.
    • serverPath - always the same as localPath.

    Note that in case of not editable source code, such as classes from JRE system library, fields branchName, changesetIdInRcs, and rcsServer are unused and set to null.

    Since:
    1.0
    Author:
    Pavol Zbell
